name: In Plain Shot
description:
In Plain Shot is an uncompromising bullet hell arcade experience featuring aircraft!

Get close to your foes and shoot them as projectiles! While still being careful not to get hit yourself as they are still deadly!

Enter into the seats of a professional aviator and show what you are made of!

made in 2h 50m for the TriJam207

WASD or ARROWS to Move

Get close to foes, aim, then SPACE or RETURN to Shoot

 

A Game By SocksNGames ~ I DO PIXELS AND GAMES SOMETIMES Music By  FesliyanStudios
